meanings.definition: Not showing symptoms of a disease or medical condition.
meanings.sent1: The patient was unsymptomatic, feeling perfectly healthy.
meanings.sent2: Even though she was unsymptomatic, the doctor recommended a check-up.
meanings.sent3: The unsymptomatic teddy bear seemed to be the healthiest in the toy hospital.
meanings.sent4: Her unsymptomatic demeanor hid the turmoil within her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unsymptomatic garden appeared vibrant and full of life.

meanings.definition: Not exhibiting signs or indications of a problem or issue.
meanings.sent1: The machine was unsymptomatic, showing no errors in its operation.
meanings.sent2: Despite being unsymptomatic, the car still needed a thorough inspection.
meanings.sent3: The unsymptomatic clock silently ticked away, unaware of its missing hour hand.
meanings.sent4: His unsymptomatic behavior masked the chaos in his personal life.
meanings.sent5: The unsymptomatic sky gave no hint of the storm brewing within.
